DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , randomize , open label parallel-group study evaluate efficacy safety subcutaneous versus intravenous MabThera/Rituxan ( rituximab ) combination CHOP chemotherapy patient previously untreated CD20-positive diffuse large B-Cell lymphoma . Patients randomize receive either MabThera/Rituxan 1400 mg subcutaneously MabThera/Rituxan 375 mg/m2 intravenously Day 1 cycle 8 cycle , combination 6-8 cycle CHOP chemotherapy . Anticipated time study treatment 6 month .
